Armed(address,uint256,uint256,uint256).notice: Emitted when the contract is armed for succession

arm(bytes[],address).notice: Arms the contract for inheritance transfer if enough heirs agree

cancel().notice: Allows the owner to cancel a pending inheritance transfer

constructor.notice: Initializes the contract with heirs, threshold, and delay

getHeirs().notice: Returns the current list of heir addresses

manualTransfer(address,uint256).notice: Allows the owner to manually transfer funds to a chosen address

triggerTransfer().notice: Allows anyone to finalize the transfer after the delay has passed

updateHeirs(address[],uint256).notice: Allows the owner to update the heirs and threshold

userdoc.notice: Manages asset transfer to heirs in the event of owner's death

documentation.text:
@title SuccessionManager - Secure and controllable cryptoasset inheritance
 @notice Manages asset transfer to heirs in the event of owner's death
@notice Restricts access to the contract owner
@notice Ensures the contract is not already armed
@notice Allows the owner to cancel a pending inheritance transfer
@notice Allows anyone to finalize the transfer after the delay has passed

@notice Returns the current list of heir addresses
 @return Array of heir addresses
@notice Accepts ether deposits into the contract
